name: The 7th Int’l Conference on Positive Psychology and Well-being (CPPWb 2024)
content: The 7th Int’l Conference on Positive Psychology and Well-being (CPPWb 2024) will be held in Kunming, China, during May 31-June 2, 2024\. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in the fields of Positive Individual Trait, Physical Health and Mental Health, Emotion Cognitions and Positive Psychology, Positive Technology, Positive Psychotherapy, Skills to Deal with Stress, Pain and Loss, Clinical Psychology and other related topics. The Conference will bring together academicians, engineers, educators and policy-makers from all over the world.
